content: easy mindless garter stitch wrap suitable even for beginners just relax with a fluffy yarn and knit a few row nothing too difficult going on here the finished wrap is a plush luxurious carrie-style shawl and oh so soft yarn hedgehog fibres super bulky 4 skeins 4x 150g colourway pictured is puffball how to add a fringe tutorial here 1 1 https //www instagram com/reel/cfghbfqk6ws/
